Please find the below e-mail and attached memo from mall management for your review and action accordingly.

 

Kind Regards,

 

From: Retailer Enquiry - DubaiMarinaMall <RetailerEnquiry@dubaimarinamall.com> 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 9:46 AM

From: Retailer Enquiry - DubaiMarinaMall RetailerEnquiry@dubaimarinamall.com <mailto:RetailerEnquiry@dubaimarinamall.com>  
Sent: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 11:30 AM
Cc: DMM Retail Relationship DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae <mailto:DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae> 
Subject: #MEMO 1769 DMM & MR Mandatory Insurance Policies and Trade License 

 

Subject: Mandatory Insurance Policies and Trade License

 

Who

:

All Retailers

 

 

 

Reason/Justification

: 

Kindly be reminded to upload into the Tenant Portal the Insurance Policies and Trade License for all your leased units in Dubai Marina Mall and Marina Retails, as stipulated in the signed Lease Agreement Clause 5.6.1 and as mentioned below:

 

1.	Mandatory Insurance Policies

a.	Property All Risk 
b.	Plate Glass
c.	Business Interruption/Increased Cost of Working/Gross Profit/Loss of Profit
d.	Third Party Liability – Limit of Indemnity should be AED 5 million and above.
e.	Workmen’s Compensation/Employer’s Liability

chunks.text:
a.	Property All Risk 
b.	Plate Glass
c.	Business Interruption/Increased Cost of Working/Gross Profit/Loss of Profit
d.	Third Party Liability – Limit of Indemnity should be AED 5 million and above.
e.	Workmen’s Compensation/Employer’s Liability

 

Please be informed that the above documents are part of the requirements upon processing any request from the Management such as NOCs, permits, and other related services, hence, kindly ensure that all documents are complete and updated.

 

Submission of physical documents are no longer accepted. 

 

Note: You can only access the Tenant Portal (link below), if you already have the username and password given by Emaar IT.

https://retailservices.emaarmalls.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/GUgXCpXx5fp86yxT2umhGaPDp?domain=retailservices.emaarmalls.com>  

 

If you have any enquiries or require further clarification, please contact your respective Retail Relationship Manager at DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae <mailto:DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae>  

 

Thank you very much for your cooperation.

 

		(Please see attached memorandum for reference)

Effective date and time

:

Memorandum circular has been distributed Today, 14-Jan-24 (Tuesday).

Best regards,

 



  

Retail Relationship Department

 

emaar.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/LyFgCkOp4FoQG4qU2f3hGZWog?domain=emaar.com>   

#DubaiMarinaMall
